mapper.select: select distinct a.url from sys_permission a left join sys_role_permission b on a.id = b.permission_id left join sys_role c on b.role_id = c.id where c.name is not null;
select c.name from sys_permission a left join sys_role_permission b on a.id = b.permission_id left join sys_role c on b.role_id = c.id where a.url = #{url}

select a.id id, a.icon icon, a.name name, a.url url, a.parent_id parentId, a.sort sort, (IF((select count(*) from sys_role b left join sys_role_permission c on b.id = c.permission_id where c.permission_id = a.id and b.id = #{roleId} ) > 0, 1, 0)) checked from sys_permission a order by a.parent_id, a.sort

select distinct a.id id, a.icon icon, a.sort sort, a.menu_flag menuFlag, a.name name, a.url url, a.parent_id parentId, a.sort sort from sys_permission a left join sys_role_permission b on a.id = b.permission_id left join sys_role c on b.role_id = c.id left join sys_user_role d on c.id = d.role_id left join sys_user e on d.user_id = e.id where e.id = #{userId} and a.menu_flag = 0 order by a.sort
select a.name from sys_role a left join sys_role_permission b on a.id = b.role_id left join sys_permission c on b.permission_id = c.id where c.url = #{url}
